statements: DELETE FROM waste_generation_patterns WHERE location_id = 1 AND waste_type = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM waste_generation_patterns WHERE waste_quantity > 1000 AND allocation_status = false;
DELETE FROM waste_generation_patterns WHERE waste_type LIKE '%Organic%' AND (waste_quantity < 500 OR waste_quantity > 1500);
DELETE FROM waste_generation_patterns WHERE location_id = 1 AND waste_type = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE location_id = 3 AND resource_type = 'Water';
DELETE FROM Waste_Generation_Patterns WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM Resource_Allocation WHERE location = 'City B' AND allocated_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM Predictive_Models WHERE model_type = 'Regression' AND accuracy < 0.8;
DELETE FROM waste_generation_patterns WHERE location = 'City A' AND quantity > 1000;
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'Water' AND quantity_available < 50;
DELETE FROM predictive_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM waste_generation_patterns WHERE region='North' AND collection_date='2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type='Material' AND allocation_date<'2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM predictive_models WHERE model_type='Regression' AND accuracy<80.00;
